========================
Custom Python docs Theme
========================

Simple sphinx theme based on
`Python Docs Sphinx Theme <https://github.com/python/python-docs-theme>`_.

Configuration Options
=====================

Inside ``conf.py``, add options in the form of : ::

    html_theme_options = {
        'key': 'value',
    }

* **link_color**
* **hover_link_color**
* **visited_link_color**
